resources.string: Failed to retrieve info. Please make sure your Mobile Data or WiFi is On
Please restart the app and grant camera access or if you clicked "Deny" on the prompt close the app and go to Settings>Apps>Nutriobot>Permissions>Camera and Click Allow and try again.
The object is not a fruit/vegetable or it is not in Nutriobot\'s list of identifiable fruit, it will soon be added :)
Vegetable information will be soon added
